Reviews.Title: Picks up everything. Nice little microphone for your CCTV setup.
Reviews.Author: Charles B. Firth "Chuck"
Reviews.Content: I love this mic. I have it hooked up to a camera on my bird feeder for hearing as well as watching the birds. The camera has built in audio but was not nearly sensitive enough. This mic picks up EVERYTHING. I need a way to shield it from wind, but other than that it is really cool to hear chickadees make sounds I never new they made while feeding. I can even hear people walking up the walkway to my office door. Neat!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic clarity and pick up!
Reviews.Author: Michele Bowman
Reviews.Content: Great! Sound range and clarity exceeded our expectations. Easy to set up and use. Surprise results that are just wonderful.

ProductInfo.Features:
S/N Ratio: 58dB
Range: 500 SQF
Audio Output: RCA Female
Sensitivity: 200mA/ubar
Work current: 0.5mA - 60mA
ProductInfo.Name: 12v CCTV Hidden Spy Microphone, Hi Sensitivity, Outdoor, RCA
